title: 3 and Out - Andy Reid's Run, Pressure's on Aaron, Divisional Round Preview, Coaching Carousel, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Andy Reid's Run, Pressure's on Aaron, Divisional Round Preview, Coaching Carousel, Mailbag
description:
John heads into a massive Divisional Round weekend by discussing the lifetime value for Super Bowl champions and bigtime playoff players, why Andy Reid's current run is so impressive, why all the pressure is on Aaron Rodgers against the Niners, and previews the entire slate of games. He also discusses the latest on the coach and GM openings around the league, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
